summary: An intense challenge where an assassin had to stab Mr. Beast with a rubber knife by the end of the day to win $100,000. Mr. Beast successfully orchestrated elaborate distractions, including escaping in a tank, Lamborghini, and a bank vault to avoid being caught. The challenge culminated in a fake injury where the assassin ultimately stabbed Mr. Beast, winning the prize.
